summary: Write a 2–3 sentence summary highlighting your craft, scope/level, and impact. Avoid buzzwords.

experience.title: Role title (e.g., Senior PM)
experience.description: Describe measurable outcomes (KPIs), scope, and systems you improved.

certifications: Add relevant certifications or remove this array

projects.name: Project Name
projects.description: Describe problem, your role, and outcome (metrics).
